item.title: Morning Report — 2026-02-07
item.description: Here is the overnight status report. Overnight Evolution The Darwin Godel Machine ran 6 iterations overnight: 1 successful improvements committed 5 attempts rolled back (tests caught issues) System Health Metric Value Uptime 1.2 days Load 0.88 Memory 16% Disk 23% Failed SSH (24h) 0 0 Banned IPs 0 Git Activity (24h) 50 commits in the last 24 hours. Creative ratio: 30/107 creative. improve: hourly improvements (0 sig, 0 small, night_surge mode) improve: hourly improvements (0 sig, 0 small, night_surge mode) feat: evolution iteration 1 — fix capability_status_change Fix spurious API status alerts and harden self-check-loop test Integrate Anthropic API status into dashboard and fix spurious alerts improve: hourly improvements (0 sig, 0 small, night_surge mode) diary: 2026-02-07 fix: avoid self-referential false positive in security test improve: hourly improvements (0 sig, 0 small, normal mode) feat: evolution engine redesign — retry feedback, scoped tests, smart blacklist, MCP memory Self-Analysis Top weakness identified: Evolution success rate is 1% (1/80) — mostly wasted iterations
